briefTitle: Efficacy/Safety of Rosuvastatin+Ezetimibe in High Risk Patients With Primary Hypercholesterolemia/Mixed Dyslipidemia
officialTitle: Phase III, Multicenter, Randomized, Open-label, Comparative Study to Evaluate Efficacy and Safety of Rosuvastatin + Ezetimibe Versus Simvastatin + Ezetimibe in High Risk Patients With Primary Hypercholesterolemia or Mixed Dyslipidemia

interventions.name: Rosuvastatin 10 mg + Ezetimibe 10 mg and Rosuvastatin 20 mg + Ezetimibe 10 mg, according to clinical evaluation.
Simvastatin 20 mg + Ezetimibe 10 mg and Simvastatin 40 mg + Ezetimibe 10 mg, according to clinical evaluation.

summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the non-inferiority between two different FDC (fixed-dose combination), measuring LDL-Cholesterol levels, in high risk patients with primary hypercholesterolemia or mixed dyslipidemia.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline compared to the end of 9 weeks of treatment
